Eats Anything?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Characteristics: Eats Anything?
By Zeke on Monday, March 4, 2002 - 04:54 pm:

How do I remove this characteristic? It is really screwing my Zan up during feeding.

By John Hawley on Monday, March 4, 2002 - 05:38 pm:

Do you have a Heart with the Gourmet characteristic? That has been the only way we have seen to remove Eats Anything.

By Zeke on Tuesday, March 5, 2002 - 11:02 am:

I dont yet, but I guess I could try to get one...

By Anonymous on Tuesday, March 5, 2002 - 02:58 pm:

Can monsters lose characteristics when they evolve?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, March 5, 2002 - 03:39 pm:

Yes, I have seen that happen.

By Tigerbubble on Wednesday, March 6, 2002 - 08:38 am:

I have noticed that the personality trait that a monster is born with are dropped after the monster's first growth. I have personally never had a monster that kept it birth personality after it's first growth.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, March 6, 2002 - 10:10 am:

The strategy guide shows those characteristics for each breed.
